titleStmt.title: LXXX sermons preached at the parish-church of St. Mary Magdalene Milk-street, London whereof nine of them not till now published / by the late eminent and learned divine Anthony Farindon ... ; in two volumes, with a large table to both.
Sermons. Selections. 1672
titleStmt.author: Farindon, Anthony, 1598-1658.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Roycroft for Richard Marriott,

notesStmt.note: Errata: p. [1] at end of v. 2.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
